name: Scratch cards!
description:
Fake money, true fun!
Scratch Cards is a virtual version of the famous scratch card games. Just scratch the grey area and find out if you've got the winning ticket to win huge amount of (virtual) money!

Collect all tickets and bonuses
- 8 different tickets to unlock
- Crazy power-ups like the monkey's paw
- A god mode to win easier but also a Human mode to simulate the real scratchcards

Only 2 advices
It's addictive :)
Don't use coins on your device display.
